data.name: Z001
data.value: I'm so sorry, sir, all our rooms are occupied at this time. Please come back later.

data.name: Z002
data.value: Would you like to save your game?

data.name: Z003
data.value: Would you like to rest for

data.name: Z004
data.value: gold pieces?

data.name: Z005
data.value: Thank you, sir. Sleep well.

data.name: Z006
data.value: Come back any time.

data.name: Z007
data.value: Your game has been saved. Would you also like to rest for

data.name: Z008
data.value: I'm sorry, sir, but it seems that you do not have enough money.

data.name: Z009
data.value: You can't possibly be thinking about going out there!

data.name: Z010
data.value: Today is a great day for a walk. Don't you agree?

data.name: Z011
data.value: I can't believe you took on all of those bandits by yourself. You're a hero.

data.name: Z012
data.value: Good to see you back, hero.

data.name: Z013
data.value: You found Small Health Potion X 3!

data.name: Z014
data.value: Be careful not to overexert yourself! You're still recuperating.

data.name: Z015
data.value: You were so brave, fighting off those bandits. I hope you didn't hurt yourself.

data.name: Z016
data.value: He is dead. There is nothing you can do for him.

data.name: Z017
data.value: Hey buddy, can you please help me?

data.name: Z018
data.value: I lost my most prized possesion somewhere in this village.

data.name: Z019
data.value: If you could find it for me, i'll make it worth your while.

data.name: Z020
data.value: The last time I remember having it is when I got a drink at the well.

data.name: Z021
data.value: Hey buddy, what's that you got there?

data.name: Z022
data.value: That's my most prized possession! It was near the well wasn't it?

data.name: Z023
data.value: Thank you so much for finding it. Here's

data.name: Z024
data.value: gold for your troubles.

data.name: Z025
data.value: Wow, thank you for finding it. Here's

data.name: Z026
data.value: gold for your troubles.

data.name: Z027
data.value: Thanks again for finding my prized possesion.

data.name: Z028
data.value: Top o' the mornin' to ya! I see ya got one a them Conversation Logs. They come handy when ya can't remember who said what.

data.name: Z029
data.value: I see ya have some seeds there. I wish I could plant 'em for ya, but my spade gone missin'.

data.name: Z030
data.value: It was one of dem bandits that took it. I saw the little varmint flee towards the forest near Tamarel.

data.name: Z031
data.value: Wow, Laddie! I saw ya thrash dem bandits like they was a bad weed growin' in a garden. You're really somethin'!

data.name: Z032
data.value: Welcome back, laddie. Ever since you left, you've been the talk of the town.

data.name: Z033
data.value: Hot diggity dog! You gone found me my spade!

data.name: Z034
data.value: Let me plant those fancy lookin' seeds of yours as a reward, free of charge.

data.name: Z035
data.value: Now you come back now when they all grown and such.

data.name: Z036
data.value: Sorry, laddie. They still ain't grown yet.

data.name: Z037
data.value: You's a gotta be patient with this here agricultural business.

data.name: Z038
data.value: Your seeds have done grown. You can take 'em whenever you wish.

data.name: Z039
data.value: You probably wonderin' what it is. I've been wonderin' dat myself...

data.name: Z040
data.value: Well it aint no ear 'a corn, I can tell you dat much. HAYUK! HAYUK! HAYUK!

data.name: Z041
data.value: Glad I could help, laddie.

data.name: Z042
data.value: It's good to see you back, sir.

data.name: Z043
data.value: As you can see, I have healed completely from my wounds. I only wish I could say the same about my twin brother...

data.name: Z044
data.value: The bandit who killed him wore a red scarf. In the midst of your battle with them, I saw the coward flee into the mushroom forest.

data.name: Z045
data.value: If I was not duty bound to protect this village, I would find him and avenge my brother.

data.name: Z046
data.value: What's that?! A red scarf?!

data.name: Z047
data.value: My brother can rest in peace now, thanks to you.

data.name: Z048
data.value: Please, take this with you on your journey. It was my brother's. I think he would want you to have it.

data.name: Z049
data.value: Good luck on your journey.

data.name: Z050
data.value: Wow! It's you! The hero of our village.

data.name: Z051
data.value: I heard the Bandit King has taken over our mushroom forest. I came here to fight that bad man. But I got lost.

data.name: Z052
data.value: I'm sure my Grandma is worried, could you help me find my way out?

data.name: Z053
data.value: Aww, man! My mean old granny is so upset she says she's never going to let me out of the house.

data.name: Z054
data.value: Here is your sword. To examine my excellent craftsmanship you will find the sword in your Inventory.

data.name: Z055
data.value: Well, don't look at me, kid. I just make the weapons. I don't know how to use them.

data.name: Z056
data.value: By the look of you, I can tell that you have no money. Get out of here!

data.name: Z057
data.value: What do you have there? A sword hilt, eh? It's pretty banged up, but it's nothing I can't handle.

data.name: Z058
data.value: I'll fix it for

data.name: Z059
data.value: gold pieces. So, what say you, buddy? I don't got all day.

data.name: Z060
data.value: It will be ready tomorrow.

data.name: Z061
data.value: Get out of here then, you good for nothing cheapskate!

data.name: Z062
data.value: What, are you deaf, kid? I said it will be ready tomorrow! Now go on, get!

data.name: Z063
data.value: So you saved our village. What do you want, a medal? Get out of my shop!

data.name: Z064
data.value: Stop wasting my time kid. You don't have enough money.

data.name: Z065
data.value: All my items are sold out at this time. Please come back later.

data.name: Z066
data.value: Would you like to view my merchandise?

data.name: Z067
data.value: I'll be okay. Thank you for saving our village.

data.name: Z068
data.value: You have picked up the Drifter's Prized Possession!

data.name: Z069
data.value: I'm glad you're feeling better. You can stay in our village for as long as you need.

data.name: Z070
data.value: I saw how you saved our village from the bandits. Your skills with that sword are quite impressive.

data.name: Z071
data.value: I would like to give you something for helping us. Here's

data.name: Z072
data.value: gold pieces.

data.name: Z073
data.value: You will always be welcome in our village. Stop by any time.

data.name: Z074
data.value: I see that my daughter has decided to go with you.

data.name: Z075
data.value: I know from experience it is pointless to argue with her once she has made up her mind.

data.name: Z076
data.value: Please, take good care of her, she is all that I have.

data.name: Z077
data.value: Welcome back, Nathan.

data.name: Z078
data.value: Be sure to stay clear of the mushroom forest. The Bandit King is not someone to be trifled with.

data.name: Z079
data.value: My word! Is that the Bandit King's crown? You are incredible, young man!

data.name: Z080
data.value: Please, take this as a token of our village's appreciation.

data.name: Z081
data.value: You received 1000 gold pieces and a Pearl Band!

data.name: Z082
data.value: You have picked up a mushroom. To see this item, check your Inventory.

data.name: Z083
data.value: In the trees behind the mushroom, a broken sword is stuck in the ground.

data.name: Z084
data.value: You received a sword hilt and a mushroom. The markings on the hilt seem familiar somehow. To see these items, check your Inventory.

data.name: Z085
data.value: You found a Ring of Justice!

data.name: Z086
data.value: You found a Small Tonic!

data.name: Z087
data.value: You found a Small Potion!

data.name: Z088
data.value: You found Small Tonic!

data.name: Z089
data.value: You found a small Potion!

data.name: Z090
data.value: You found a Ring of Justice!

data.name: Z091
data.value: Your seeds have done grown.

data.name: Z092
data.value: You picked up the Mysteria Plant.

data.name: Z093
data.value: Thank you for the mushrooms, Sonny.

data.name: Z094
data.value: Oh! You've found some mushrooms. These will be perfect for my grandson's soup, but I still need more.

data.name: Z095
data.value: Could you look again? That would be so sweet of you.

data.name: Z096
data.value: My grandson is very sick. His favorite food is mushroom soup, it always makes him feel better.

data.name: Z097
data.value: Sadly, I'm all out of mushrooms. What am I to do? I need four mushrooms and I'm too old to gather them myself.

data.name: Z098
data.value: That's enough mushrooms. Thank you so much! Here's

data.name: Z099
data.value: gold pieces for helping me out.

data.name: Z100
data.value: What's that? You found a sword hilt in the forest? That looks mighty nice, sonny.

data.name: Z101
data.value: Oh! I see you have enough mushrooms for me to make my mushroom soup.

data.name: Z102
data.value: You see, my grandson is very sick and my mushroom soup always makes him feel better. Go ahead and place the mushrooms on the table there.

data.name: Z103
data.value: Thank you so much! Here's

data.name: Z104
data.value: gold pieces for helping me out.

data.name: Z105
data.value: What's that? You found a sword hilt? That looks mighty nice, sonny.

data.name: Z106
data.value: I was so scared of those bandits I thought my old ticker would give out. Thank you for saving us, Sonny.

data.name: Z107
data.value: I'm glad you're here, sonny. My grandson has gone missing.

data.name: Z108
data.value: I'm afraid he might have gone into the mushroom forest. After you left, there have been frequent sightings of bandits living there.

data.name: Z109
data.value: Oh, I am so worried. Could you be a dear and find him for me? I would look for him myself but these old bones of mine are not what they use to be.

data.name: Z110
data.value: I am so happy you found my grandson. Here, please take this.

data.name: Z111
data.value: Thanks for helping me again, sonny.

data.name: Z112
data.value: You have picked up a note

data.name: Z113
data.value: My granny won't let me outta bed. She keeps sayin' I'm too sick...

data.name: Z114
data.value: But I'm not! I'm the greatest warrior in the village! I'm too strong to get sick!

data.name: Z115
data.value: I don't care what she says! I'm gonna get outta my bed!

data.name: Z116
data.value: *cough!* *cough!* Well, maybe I'll stay for a little longer.

data.name: Z117
data.value: Wow! Did you really take care of those nasty bandits? I woulda' helped you but my mean old granny wouldn't let me.

data.name: Z118
data.value: You found a Large Potion!

data.name: Z119
data.value: You found a Medium Tonic!

data.name: Z120
data.value: You found a Training Belt!

data.name: Z121
data.value: You found a Battle Mage's Ring!

data.name: Z122
data.value: You found a Large Tonic!

data.name: Z123
data.value: You found a Chain of Skies!

data.name: Z124
data.value: You found a Nature Charm!

data.name: Z125
data.value: You found a Chain of Flame!

data.name: Z126
data.value: You found a Earthen Gloves!

data.name: Z127
data.value: You found a Chain of the Sea!

data.name: Z128
data.value: You found a Medium Potion!

data.name: Z129
data.value: You found a Spiked Chain!

data.name: Z130
data.value: You found a Battle Thief's Ring!

data.name: Z131
data.value: You found a Battle Lord's Ring!

data.name: Z132
data.value: You found 2000 gold and a Battle Lord's Ring!

data.name: Z133
data.value: You found a Monster!

data.name: Z134
data.value: Please, save us! The monsters came out of nowhere, and my friend is still in the castle! You have a sword, right? Go fight them!

data.name: Z135
data.value: Please, help me!

data.name: Z136
data.value: Thank you for saving me! I thought I was a goner...

data.name: Z137
data.value: Oh! I almost forgot. There was a mysterious man heading to the top of the tower.

data.name: Z138
data.value: I fear he may be after the artifact... I should go find my friend. She's probably worried sick! Thanks again!

data.name: Z139
data.value: I don't believe it, It's you! Do you remember me from the tower?

data.name: Z140
data.value: You saved me. I wouldn't have made it without you.

data.name: Z141
data.value: I didn't see you after... well, you know. What happened to you that day?

data.name: Z142
data.value: Thanks again! I'll never forget what you did for me.

data.name: Z143
data.value: I am forever in your debt.

data.name: Z144
data.value: You chose the empty chest!

data.name: Z145
data.value: You chose the wrong chest!

data.name: Z146
data.value: ARRRRRRRR

data.name: Z147
data.value: You found the gold!

data.name: Z148
data.value: Something has gotten into my chests!!!

data.name: Z149
data.value: Everytime I try to get my gold out of one chest, they start moving around.

data.name: Z150
data.value: Maybe you will be able to figure out which chest the gold is in.

data.name: Z151
data.value: Good eye! Thanks for getting my gold. Here, take this for your troubles.

data.name: Z152
data.value: Now all my gold is gone!

data.name: Z153
data.value: Thanks for nothing!!!

data.name: Z154
data.value: Thank you for trying. I had a feeling it was a ghost.

data.name: Z155
data.value: Here, take this for your trouble.

data.name: Z156
data.value: Thanks again for getting my gold back!

data.name: Z157
data.value: What am I going to do now that my gold is gone?

data.name: Z158
data.value: Thank you for your help dispatching that ghost.

data.name: Z159
data.value: Choose the chest with the gold in it.

data.name: Z160
data.value: Please, save our library, mister!

data.name: Z161
data.value: Thanks for saving our library, mister!

data.name: Z162
data.value: Sorry about before. You can never be too careful.

data.name: Z163
data.value: Thank you for saving our library. You are welcome here any time, friend.

data.name: Z164
data.value: I am the curator of this library. I don't know how the library became possessed, but I understand you are going to cleanse it, correct?

data.name: Z165
data.value: Seeing as how you are not a mage, you will definitely get stuck. We mages have magical passages that we use to travel through the library.

data.name: Z166
data.value: In a similar manner to how you found this town, you must find these passages as well.

data.name: Z167
data.value: So, when you think there's nowhere else to go, let the books themselves point you in the right direction.

data.name: Z168
data.value: All of this was caused by a mantis? I knew I should have kept a closer eye on Billy.

data.name: Z169
data.value: He likes to read books containing all kinds of monsters. It was only a matter of time before he tried to summon one.

data.name: Z170
data.value: Well, thanks for saving our library. I don't look forward to cleaning up the mess I'm sure to find when I return.

data.name: Z171
data.value: Chest won't open!

data.name: Z172
data.value: In order to cleanse the library, you must destroy the source of the disturbance.

data.name: Z173
data.value: Good luck, young travelers.

data.name: Z174
data.value: You must seek out the blacksmith in Snowy Ridge.

data.name: Z175
data.value: So, you have found Zella. I see that she has restored your Lacuna Blade. This is great news.

data.name: Z176
data.value: I have also regained my memories. My Uncle Arlan plans to bring Mal'ticar back to life.

data.name: Z177
data.value: Is there anything we can do to stop him?

data.name: Z178
data.value: What? Are you sure? How does Arlan know the ritual?

data.name: Z179
data.value: All the texts describing it were destroyed, I saw to it myself!

data.name: Z180
data.value: However, how he found out is not important. We must stop him.

data.name: Z181
data.value: The last phase of the ritual must be performed in Verithus Castle.

data.name: Z182
data.value: Even though your Lacuna Blade is fully restored, you will still need our help to create a rift strong enough to cross the great ocean.

data.name: Z183
data.value: I will gather a few of my mages, and we shall meet you at the southern tip of Ellaethia.

data.name: Z184
data.value: Now, hurry! There is no time to spare!

data.name: Z185
data.value: Hurry to the southern tip. I will meet you there as soon as I can.

data.name: Z186
data.value: Do not worry about us young hero. You just make sure to stop your uncle before it is too late.

data.name: Z187
data.value: 25413... Two... Five... Four... One... Three...

data.name: Z188
data.value: Aaargh, I just don't get it!

data.name: Z189
data.value: I found a guide on how to open chests in the library, but it just baffles me. I'll never be able to open chests.

data.name: Z190
data.value: I got it! 25413 must be the order of those five chests in the library!

data.name: Z191
data.value: What's that? You already figured it out? My life no longer has a purpose...

data.name: Z192
data.value: Mister! You have to help me! Tippers and I were playing hide and seek in the library.

data.name: Z193
data.value: *Sniff* I was the seeker a-a-and the ghosts took over the library! I can hear him calling out for me.

data.name: Z194
data.value: You have to find him, mister!

data.name: Z195
data.value: Have you seen my bear Tippers?

data.name: Z196
data.value: Tippers! You're the bestest person I've ever met! Thank you so much! I'm going home to play with Tippers. You wanna play too?

data.name: Z197
data.value: Hi, mister! Tippers says thank you, now go away.

data.name: Z198
data.value: Go away, mister! Tippers says I don't need any more friends. Now leave us alone!

data.name: Z199
data.value: This is the last time, mister! Tippers says he will have to hurt you if you don't leave. Please go away.

data.name: Z200
data.value: You won't like Tippers when he's angry.

data.name: Z201
data.value: You have ignored my warning boy, now you will have to face the consequences for your actions!

data.name: Z202
data.value: Prepare to die as so many have before!

data.name: Z203
data.value: Tippers!? Why would you hurt Tippers like that? He never did anything to hurt you!

data.name: Z204
data.value: Tippers says he's having a lot of fun with you. I remember when I found him when I was six.

data.name: Z205
data.value: Tippers and I have been a great team since the day we met.

data.name: Z206
data.value: Did you get dizzy when you walked down here? As you walked down through the secret entrance, you must have felt gravity shifting.

data.name: Z207
data.value: When Ellaethia and Agora were split, the great mages took Celindar and flipped it upside down to hide themselves underground.

data.name: Z208
data.value: They thought Mal'ticar was going to exterminate everyone so this was the only way to save our race and our history.

data.name: Z209
data.value: It's simply amazing what can be done with magic.

data.name: Z210
data.value: I am honored to be a part of this pivotal moment in history.

data.name: Z211
data.value: Good luck hero!

data.name: Z212
data.value: Here is your armor, I made it lighter so you should have more stamina in battle. I hope its to your liking.

data.name: Z213
data.value: So you're the ones causing all the ruckus...

data.name: Z214
data.value: Ruith will probably get upset if he finds me helping you.

data.name: Z215
data.value: Bah! I never liked that guy anyway.

data.name: Z216
data.value: How about I give your party's armor there a face lift for only

data.name: Z217
data.value: gold pieces?

data.name: Z218
data.value: What do you say?

data.name: Z219
data.value: Come back tomorrow to pick them up.

data.name: Z220
data.value: Ok, but you're making a mistake.

data.name: Z221
data.value: Not enough money? Well, that's too bad.

data.name: Z222
data.value: Im good, kid, but I'm not that good. Come back tomorrow.

data.name: Z223
data.value: How's that armor treating you?

data.name: Z224
data.value: You received new armor for your party!

data.name: Z225
data.value: Each piece of armor has been imbued with magic.

data.name: Z226
data.value: Would you like to view my merchandise?

data.name: Z227
data.value: Hold on there mister! We can't let you leave just yet. Haven't you heard of the plague?

data.name: Z228
data.value: There's a disease infested town west of here so we are currently restricting access to the outside world past the mountain range.

data.name: Z229
data.value: Once you've cleansed the library, I may trust you enough to not spread the plague to our civilization.

data.name: Z230
data.value: Thank you for saving our library, now our legacy can live on through generations.

data.name: Z231
data.value: Would you like to go to the other side of Ellaethia?

data.name: Z232
data.value: Have a safe trip! Good luck on your journey!

data.name: Z233
data.value: That's okay, stay as long as you want. Just let me know when you're ready to proceed through the mountains.

data.name: Z234
data.value: Hey there, young ones. You might be able to help me. I've lost my hat and I can't seem to find it anywhere.

data.name: Z235
data.value: Do you think the three of you could help me find it? You'll know its mine because my name is sewn into the brim.

data.name: Z236
data.value: If you find it, bring it to me and I will reward you handsomely. Good luck!

data.name: Z237
data.value: What? You say you found my hat where? Well, that makes a bit of sense.

data.name: Z238
data.value: I guess I forgot to mention earlier that peculiar things tend to happen with these old wizard hats. They seem to have a mind of their own sometimes.

data.name: Z239
data.value: Well, thank you very much. Here is your reward, as promised.

data.name: Z240
data.value: You found Medium Potion X 2

data.name: Z241
data.value: and 500 gold!

data.name: Z242
data.value: Thanks again, young'ins. I hope finding my hat wasn't too much trouble for you.

data.name: Z243
data.value: You may have Endor fooled, but not me. I'm keeping my eyes on you.

data.name: Z244
data.value: So you were able to cleanse the library. Well, I still don't trust you.

data.name: Z245
data.value: We will keep the rift open for you.

data.name: Z246
data.value: Have you heard about the terrible plague in the swamp town near the west coast?

data.name: Z247
data.value: I feel so bad for those poor people.

data.name: Z248
data.value: Ive been spending every waking hour trying to devise a cure for whatever is making them all so sick.

data.name: Z249
data.value: You found a Wizard Hat!

data.name: Z250
data.value: You found Large Tonic X 3!

data.name: Z251
data.value: You have picked up a key!

data.name: Z252
data.value: You found Tippers!

data.name: Z253
data.value: Why did I wear my brand new white pendant, now I've gone and lost it...

data.name: Z254
data.value: What a wonderful day.

data.name: Z255
data.value: Go see Endor. I'm sure he has a plan to help you.

data.name: Z256
data.value: You have picked up a book!

data.name: Z257
data.value: One of those pesky neighbors must have stolen my book!

data.name: Z258
data.value: I had it sitting right here on the table last night, and now, it's gone!

data.name: Z259
data.value: Can you do me a favor and check inside the other houses around town?

data.name: Z260
data.value: I'm sure one of those THIEVES stole it.

data.name: Z261
data.value: Can you please find my book?

data.name: Z262
data.value: I can't believe I live in this town with these THIEVES!

data.name: Z263
data.value: Oooops!

data.name: Z264
data.value: It was upstairs this whole time?

data.name: Z265
data.value: One of those thieves must have broke in and moved it on me!

data.name: Z266
data.value: Anyways... You don't seem like a thief, take this.

data.name: Z267
data.value: You can't trust anyone in this town...

data.name: Z268
data.value: Oh, kids these days!

data.name: Z269
data.value: I plan on owning this house one day, but for now I can only dream. It's vacant right now, I just need to get the money to buy it.

data.name: Z270
data.value: Don't tell anybody, but sometimes I sleep in the house at night and pretend like I live there.

data.name: Z271
data.value: I read bedtime stories to my imaginary children all the time. I need to live here, it's my destiny.

data.name: Z272
data.value: This doesn't make any sense! Someone else is living in this house! I was told by my father that I would live here one day.

data.name: Z273
data.value: I'm leaving forever! I just hope the man in this house will love the house the way I would if I were living there.

data.name: Z274
data.value: So long traveler, maybe we'll meet again elsewhere.

data.name: Z275
data.value: It's you again! Listen! There are strange creatures in this cave. I need to find where they live and become part of their tribe.

data.name: Z276
data.value: These creatures seem to be quasi-human and they look friendly. I'm just saying, maybe we should look for these creatures.

data.name: Z277
data.value: You opened the chest!

data.name: Z278
data.value: You seem to possess a very powerful skill.

data.name: Z279
data.value: In the right hands, a person could use this ability to form rifts, and do very special things.

data.name: Z280
data.value: Let's see what you can do with your rift skill.

data.name: Z281
data.value: Somewhere in one of the previous lands you have visited I have placed a key that unlocks this chest.

data.name: Z282
data.value: To figure out where it is you must solve this riddle:

data.name: Z283
data.value: In the swampy town that is filled with pests, you will find the key in a place of rest.

data.name: Z284
data.value: The riddle is:

data.name: Z285
data.value: In the swampy town where the frogs do hop, you will find the key in a place to shop.

data.name: Z286
data.value: Wow, you solved all my riddles!

data.name: Z287
data.value: There is a surprise for you inside this chest.

data.name: Z288
data.value: You deserve to have the power to Rift.

data.name: Z289
data.value: You still have not found the key.

data.name: Z290
data.value: You guys new around here?

data.name: Z291
data.value: Well if you are looking for a blacksmith, you're out of luck.

data.name: Z292
data.value: We haven't had one here for quite some time.

data.name: Z293
data.value: However, there are rumors that the old hermit that lives north-west of here used to be one of the best blacksmiths in the land.

data.name: Z294
data.value: They are just rumors, of course. I wouldn't place much stock in them.

data.name: Z295
data.value: So, that hermit really is some kind of master blacksmith...

data.name: Z296
data.value: And here I thought he was just another crazy old coot.

data.name: Z297
data.value: Looking for something, kid?

data.name: Z298
data.value: You don't look like you're from here. Where are you from stranger?

data.name: Z299
data.value: Okay... You must be one of those silent types.

data.name: Z300
data.value: Would you stop staring at me then! You're freaking me out!

data.name: Z301
data.value: Please, help us.

data.name: Z302
data.value: I'm afraid my son will not last much longer.

data.name: Z303
data.value: You saved my son. I am forever grateful.

data.name: Z304
data.value: TAG!!! You're It!!!

data.name: Z305
data.value: I almost got away, but you cornered me.

data.name: Z306
data.value: Nobody ever catches me!

data.name: Z307
data.value: Don't tell anyone and you can have this gold.

data.name: Z308
data.value: Remember... You never got me right?

data.name: Z309
data.value: Where is my mom .. I lost her...

data.name: Z310
data.value: You know where my mom is? Show me!

data.name: Z311
data.value: You have picked up a toy!

data.name: Z312
data.value: My baby boy is lost! Can you help me find him?

data.name: Z313
data.value: I don't feel so well...

data.name: Z314
data.value: I feel so much better now.

data.name: Z315
data.value: You found a key!

data.name: Z316
data.value: What a hopeless place I live in... Why was I born here?

data.name: Z317
data.value: I'm afraid we won't make it.

data.name: Z318
data.value: Chepetawa, how could you...

data.name: Z319
data.value: I heard you were the one who defeated Chepetawa. Thank you, kind sir.

data.name: Z320
data.value: Want to buy some Snake Boots?

data.name: Z321
data.value: *COUGH!* *COUGH!*

data.name: Z322
data.value: Thank you for saving my life.

data.name: Z323
data.value: I hope I feel better soon so that I can play outside.

data.name: Z324
data.value: It's great to play outside again.

data.name: Z325
data.value: AARRRRRRRR

data.name: Z326
data.value: Damn that Chepetawa! I never did like her.

data.name: Z327
data.value: So you are the brave young man that took down Chepetawa.

data.name: Z328
data.value: It is an honor to meet you.

data.name: Z329
data.value: This plague will be the death of us all.

data.name: Z330
data.value: Thank you for saving our town, young man.

data.name: Z331
data.value: Please stop Chepetawa. It is the only way to save our town. The Sewn Bog is in the thicket of trees north of Chapaka.

data.name: Z332
data.value: You will always be welcome in our town.

data.name: Z333
data.value: I was playing with my toy by the merchant shop, and a mean monster came and made me drop it.

data.name: Z334
data.value: He has it and I can't get it back.

data.name: Z335
data.value: Follow me and I'll show you.

data.name: Z336
data.value: Please, get my toy back.

data.name: Z337
data.value: Where did you learn to fight like that, mister?

data.name: Z338
data.value: Thank you for making that mean monster give me my toy back.

data.name: Z339
data.value: Here, you can have this old ring I found laying on the ground!

data.name: Z340
data.value: I love my toy. Thanks for getting it back.

data.name: Z341
data.value: Up, Left, Down, Right, Right, Left.

data.name: Z342
data.value: You found a Skirmish Ring!

data.name: Z343
data.value: You found a Translucent Ring!

data.name: Z344
data.value: You found a Shadow Strike Ring!

data.name: Z345
data.value: You found a Jade Statue!

data.name: Z346
data.value: You found a Lapiz Lazuli Ring!

data.name: Z347
data.value: You received a Obsidian Charm!

data.name: Z348
data.value: Hey, you! Watch out for the thieves around here, especially this guy to my left.

data.name: Z349
data.value: He's holding a purse right now... and I'm pretty sure that it's not his.

data.name: Z350
data.value: Hey, you! Watch out for the thieves around here, especially this guy to my... Oh, what the... Where did he go?

data.name: Z351
data.value: He must have ran off with someone else's purse!

data.name: Z352
data.value: I love this time of night. Don't you?

data.name: Z353
data.value: Things are finally starting to calm down here in town and you can shop without having to fight off the crowds with a stick.

data.name: Z354
data.value: If you're looking for something specific, you better hurry.

data.name: Z355
data.value: As much as the shop owners would love to stay open all night, they have to sleep eventually.

data.name: Z356
data.value: Welcome to Tamarel! All kinds of merchants come to this town!

data.name: Z357
data.value: Are you looking for something special?

data.name: Z358
data.value: All the shop keepers are going to be closing up soon so you might get a good deal on something if you're lucky.

data.name: Z359
data.value: The owner of the mansion has too much money. He keeps it all and spends it only on himself.

data.name: Z360
data.value: He owns the town's market and hires people to tend the stands. You would think he'd run out of things to buy.

data.name: Z361
data.value: He's ruining the economy around here. He deserves to have everything stolen from him.

data.name: Z362
data.value: Yeah, just to see what it's like to have nothing.

data.name: Z363
data.value: Exactly! I would be so-

data.name: Z364
data.value: And then some brave young soul would return his stolen items out of the goodness of his heart.

data.name: Z365
data.value: Then the good samaritan will fight an evil magic praying mantis in a library. There will be books everywhere!

data.name: Z366
data.value: What!? About half of that wasn't really part of the subject matter.

data.name: Z367
data.value: In fact, none of what you said made any sense at all. I'll never hear anything stupider than that as long as I live.

data.name: Z368
data.value: Stupider isn't a word.

data.name: Z369
data.value: *Sigh*

data.name: Z370
data.value: I heard about a rare map that actually shows the entire continent of Ellaethia.

data.name: Z371
data.value: The man who made it was selfish and decided to hide it in a cave somewhere. No one knows where it is.

data.name: Z372
data.value: Zzzzz... Wha- What? Michael's sleeping again? I'm getting tired of this guy.

data.name: Z373
data.value: You can buy maps from town merchants. I can't imagine what I would do without them.

data.name: Z374
data.value: I'm trying to collect them all.

data.name: Z375
data.value: Don't just stand here! That thieving cur's getting away! Get moving, kid!

data.name: Z376
data.value: You guys again? Well I guess you can stay. Just dont touch anything.

data.name: Z377
data.value: You have to help me! Someone stole my purse!

data.name: Z378
data.value: Is that... my purse? Thank you so much!

data.name: Z379
data.value: Please, take this reward.

data.name: Z380
data.value: I'm sure we won't be seeing that creep around anymore. You're a life saver.

data.name: Z381
data.value: These shop keepers are really generous this time of night.

data.name: Z382
data.value: They're getting ready to go home so they'll settle for any price just to make a quick sale.

data.name: Z383
data.value: If you know what you're doing, you can do very well for yourself some nights.

data.name: Z384
data.value: Welcome to my store, feel free to look around!

data.name: Z385
data.value: I never got a chance to buy an anniversary gift for my wife. She won't be happy when I get home...

data.name: Z386
data.value: Would you like to give the necklace to the merchant?

data.name: Z387
data.value: What's this?! Why thank you. The world could use more kindness like that.

data.name: Z388
data.value: I don't have much to give in return, but I'm sure I could scrounge something up.

data.name: Z389
data.value: Ah, here we are. A brand new beard trimmer!

data.name: Z390
data.value: Please take this beard trimmer as a token of my appreciation.

data.name: Z391
data.value: Welcome, now buy something or leave!

data.name: Z392
data.value: What do you want? I'm leaving soon so make it quick or get out.

data.name: Z393
data.value: Would you like to offer the display sword to the merchant for a trade?

data.name: Z394
data.value: That's a nice sword you got there. I think you better be a good girl and hand it over.

data.name: Z395
data.value: Don't you even think about makin' a scene or there'll be trouble.

data.name: Z396
data.value: I'm the last open shop in town so you better hurry back if you know what's good for you.

data.name: Z397
data.value: Are you threatening me?!

data.name: Z398
data.value: You better rethink what you're doing before you end up in a world of hurt.

data.name: Z399
data.value: I don't take kindly to being pushed around.

data.name: Z400
data.value: HAHAHAHAHA! You've got a mouth on you don't you.

data.name: Z401
data.value: I hate to ruin a pretty face like yours, but someone needs to teach you a lesson!

data.name: Z402
data.value: That got out of hand fast. Looks like I knocked him out.

data.name: Z403
data.value: Oh wow! This would be perfect for Nathan! I think I'll take it.

data.name: Z404
data.value: I'll leave the display sword. It was junk anyway, and I'd hate to feel like I'm stealing.

data.name: Z405
data.value: Cara has received Nathan's Gift.

data.name: Z406
data.value: He's still knocked out. I better get back to Nathan before this guy comes to his senses.

data.name: Z407
data.value: AH! Get her away from me! Please don't let her hurt me!

data.name: Z408
data.value: Some advice for you...

data.name: Z409
data.value: Don't make her angry if you value your health.

data.name: Z410
data.value: Hello there young lad! If you were looking for something to buy, I'm afraid I'm closed.

data.name: Z411
data.value: I'm just waiting to see if anyone in town would like to buy my space and I'll never return!

data.name: Z412
data.value: Everybody's in debt to the mansion owner, and it's just too much for me.

data.name: Z413
data.value: Some guy hired me to save this space for him until he finds out what he wants to do.

data.name: Z414
data.value: I'm not complaining, I'm getting paid to do nothing!

data.name: Z415
data.value: My boss said you'd come browse our accessories. Would you like to buy something?

data.name: Z416
data.value: HI HOW ARE YOU!? I...I... there's nothing going on he-

data.name: Z417
data.value: AHHHHHH!

data.name: Z418
data.value: Oh what? Yeah, I don't have anybody's purse...

data.name: Z419
data.value: Don't look at me!

data.name: Z420
data.value: Ack! How did you find me! Did the mimbies tell you where I was?

data.name: Z421
data.value: Nobody believes me! I know they're around here somewhere. They probably stole the purse that I have.

data.name: Z422
data.value: WAIT! If I have the purse, then they don't have the purse!

data.name: Z423
data.value: Look over there!

data.name: Z424
data.value: Rats! I knew I should have hid under the b-b-b-bed.

data.name: Z425
data.value: Ha! Remember when we first met? Those were the good old days. We played Duck Duck Goose and we did jumping jacks.

data.name: Z426
data.value: Why is it called Duck Duck Goose? Well I know when night falls, ducks grow teeth and become carnivorous beasts and-

data.name: Z427
data.value: Oh yeah, I need to make my escape!

data.name: Z428
data.value: Rock-a-bye baby in the tree top...

data.name: Z429
data.value: Woah! I remember you from before! You were the...

data.name: Z430
data.value: Uhh... the...

data.name: Z431
data.value: Oh yeah! That guy with the hair.

data.name: Z432
data.value: Here, take this purse, I don't remember what I wanted to do with it. Bye, friends!

data.name: Z433
data.value: The owner of this mansion is a bad man! He's only giving me food. I don't need food, I need money.

data.name: Z434
data.value: Could you spare 100 gold pieces?

data.name: Z435
data.value: You are just as bad as the owner of the mansion! Come back when you start to feel sorry for me.

data.name: Z436
data.value: Hmmm, could you spare me 1362 more gold then?

data.name: Z437
data.value: Oh well, I guess I'll just open a store here. I had high hopes for a place up north, but I guess I can start here.

data.name: Z438
data.value: If you ever start to feel sorry for me, drop by and give me that gold you know you should have given me now.

data.name: Z439
data.value: Really? I'll see you later... maybe. Thanks for doing the right thing!

data.name: Z440
data.value: Ha! you're just as poor as me, come back when you make money.

data.name: Z441
data.value: Hey, it's you again! Thanks to you, I've opened a ring shop. Would you like to view my merchandise?

data.name: Z442
data.value: Oh... well are you going to give me 1362 gold then?

data.name: Z443
data.value: *Sigh*... I guess I'll never live life to the fullest. I'll never be able to fulfill my dreams.

data.name: Z444
data.value: Wow! It's you again. I just knew I'd see you again, that's why I left without saying anything before.

data.name: Z445
data.value: You made me rich, here, take this for free. Thanks for the help! I am a changed man now.

data.name: Z446
data.value: I sure do fancy the rich life, it's quite spectacular indeed. My chaps are starting a new store back at Tamarel.

data.name: Z447
data.value: I say, you should scuttle your way over there now. This conversation has been quite pleasant, hmm, yes, pleasant indeed. Good day, chum!

data.name: Z448
data.value: Sorry, sir, but all my merchandise is sold out, except for this one bag of seeds.

data.name: Z449
data.value: These seeds are very rare and are rumored to grow into a plant with magical properties.

data.name: Z450
data.value: But no one seems to want to buy them.

data.name: Z451
data.value: I'll sell them to you for

data.name: Z452
data.value: Really?! Thank you, sir!

data.name: Z453
data.value: Oh well, I guess I'm still stuck with them then.

data.name: Z454
data.value: Sorry, I have nothing left to sell. Thanks for stopping by.

data.name: Z455
data.value: Oh, it looks like you do not have enough money.

data.name: Z456
data.value: You received a bag of rare seeds!

data.name: Z457
data.value: Hello, would you like to purchase this fine necklace I have here? It's a real bargain.

data.name: Z458
data.value: Pleasure doing business with you. Hope to see you again.

data.name: Z459
data.value: The offer only lasts until I close. Come back if you change your mind.

data.name: Z460
data.value: Sorry, I'm closed for the night. Please come back tomorrow.

data.name: Z461
data.value: Cara has recieved a Necklace.

data.name: Z462
data.value: Here is your scythe. As you can clearly see, my skill far exceeds that two-bit hack who repaired your sword.

data.name: Z463
data.value: I see the blacksmith that repaired your sorry excuse for a weapon sent you over here to gloat.

data.name: Z464
data.value: I don't have time for this. Get out!

data.name: Z465
data.value: So you broke your scythe, eh? And now you come crying to me to fix it. Am I correct?

data.name: Z466
data.value: Well, it's not going to be cheap.

data.name: Z467
data.value: I'll fix it for

data.name: Z468
data.value: It will be ready tomorrow.

data.name: Z469
data.value: Too expensive for you eh?

data.name: Z470
data.value: Well, that's too bad. I don't negotiate. Especially with the likes of you!

data.name: Z471
data.value: Who are you trying to fool, kid? Come back when you have enough money.

data.name: Z472
data.value: I hate repeating myself, kid! I said it will be ready tomorrow!

data.name: Z473
data.value: You again?

data.name: Z474
data.value: There is nothing you have that needs repairing. So stop wasting my time!

data.name: Z475
data.value: Hello missy. What can I do for you?

data.name: Z476
data.value: Would you like to offer the beard trimmer to the merchant for a trade?

data.name: Z477
data.value: Oh so you want to trade that beard trimmer for one of my wares, eh?

data.name: Z478
data.value: Is there something wrong with my beard? I guess it could use a little attention.

data.name: Z479
data.value: Well I do have this display sword that no one seems to want.

data.name: Z480
data.value: Turns out impractical weapons aren't in much demand these days.

data.name: Z481
data.value: How about we trade your trimmer for my sword?

data.name: Z482
data.value: Nothing, eh? Okay well I'll be leaving soon so hurry back if you change your mind.

data.name: Z483
data.value: Cara has received a Display Sword.

data.name: Z484
data.value: Thanks for the trimmers. I'm sure to impress the ladies now.

data.name: Z485
data.value: You found a Ring Of Calling!

data.name: Z486
data.value: You found a Ring of Veneration!

data.name: Z487
data.value: You found a Ring of Bravura!

data.name: Z488
data.value: You found a Ring of The Sages!

data.name: Z489
data.value: You found a key to the courtyard door!

data.name: Z490
data.value: Hey, how would you like to play a game?

data.name: Z491
data.value: Great! Okay this is how you play. I am going to put a treasure in this chest next to me.

data.name: Z492
data.value: You need to watch that chest and see if you can pick it out once the chests stop moving.

data.name: Z493
data.value: If you can find the treasure on your first try, you get to keep it.

data.name: Z494
data.value: Ready.......and.......START!

data.name: Z495
data.value: Your loss.....

data.name: Z496
data.value: Come back if you change your mind.

data.name: Z497
data.value: You chose an empty chest.

data.name: Z498
data.value: You found a Shadow Strike Ring!

data.name: Z499
data.value: Wow! I can't believe you were able to pick the right chest. I thought you were blind.

data.name: Z500
data.value: Sorry, but you only get one shot.

data.name: Z501
data.value: I sense a stong power in you. Be careful not to let it consume you.

data.name: Z502
data.value: Have you heard of hallows?

data.name: Z503
data.value: When a mage feels they have been wronged by a non-magic user, they typically make them a hallow.

data.name: Z504
data.value: When a mage makes a hallow they take away one of their victims' five senses. The sense that they take away is decided by how badly the mage was wronged.

data.name: Z505
data.value: The lesser senses, like touch, taste, and smell, are for minor offenses. A mage will only take hearing or sight if they feel greatly wronged.

data.name: Z506
data.value: You're blind aren't you? There's no way I'd let you get killed out there, you probably couldn't kill a flyder!

data.name: Z507
data.value: Celindar is dangerous at night. Sleep walking is common in us mages and sometimes we leave our homes.

data.name: Z508
data.value: You would be amazed to see what can happen when you're confronted by a sleep walking mage. It gets ugly.

data.name: Z509
data.value: You caused quite a ruckus when you and your friends showed up here. Don't try to start anything. I say this for your own good.

data.name: Z510
data.value: You smell like burning......hehehe

data.name: Z511
data.value: You found a Large Potion X3!

data.name: Z512
data.value: You found a Large Potion X4!

data.name: Z513
data.value: Wait!!!!

data.name: Z514
data.value: You're going on a quest to find your identity, aren't you?

data.name: Z515
data.value: Well, I can't let you go alone. You're still recovering after all.

data.name: Z516
data.value: I'm going to join you, and you have absolutely no say in the matter!

data.name: Z517
data.value: Cara has joined your party!

data.name: Z518
data.value: Looting this village is gonna be easier than we thought!

data.name: Z519
data.value: Yeah, all they had to slow us down was a couple of wimpy guards.

data.name: Z520
data.value: Hey, check this guy out. He thinks he's safe hiding behind those trees!

data.name: Z521
data.value: Let's get him!

data.name: Z522
data.value: Oh no! The village is under attack by bandits! What do we do? What do we do!?

data.name: Z523
data.value: Sorry, sir, we can't allow you to leave. It's for your own safety.

data.name: Z524
data.value: Due to the increasing number of bandits in the vicinity, the town is currently on lock down.

data.name: Z525
data.value: Oh! You're finally awake. Don't be alarmed, you're safe here. We found you in the forest.

data.name: Z526
data.value: My name's Cara. I've been taking good care of you. You may want to take it easy for a little while.

data.name: Z527
data.value: So what's your name?

data.name: Z528
data.value: You don't remember, do you?

data.name: Z529
data.value: Do you remember where you came from, how you got hurt, anything?!

data.name: Z530
data.value: Thats terrible...

data.name: Z531
data.value: Well try taking a walk around town. There are plenty of nice people for you to meet, and I'm sure they'd like to meet you too.

data.name: Z532
data.value: Hopefully some fresh air will help jog your memory.

data.name: Z533
data.value: Please, feel free to take the potions over there in the chest. They may come in handy later.

data.name: Z534
data.value: Oh, before you go, my dad said he would like you to keep this practice sword with you. Just in case you run into any trouble.

data.name: Z535
data.value: Well, you look ready to go. I won't keep you any longer. Stay safe!

data.name: Z536
data.value: You received a Ring of Veneration and 500 gold pieces.

data.name: Z537
data.value: ... And then I said, that's no mushroom, that's my wife! Ho ho ho, ho!

data.name: Z538
data.value: Dad! Look! It's a handsome young man!

data.name: Z539
data.value: Now, now, Cara. He needs our help and hospitality. Grab his legs, we'll let him stay in our house, he needs rest.

data.name: Z540
data.value: I'll watch him!

data.name: Z541
data.value: ... To make sure he's okay, and he stays healthy and stuff...

data.name: Z542
data.value: Cara, that's...

data.name: Z543
data.value: A marvelous idea!

data.name: Z544
data.value: Somebody help us! There's too many of 'em!

data.name: Z545
data.value: It's good to see you Cara. And you too...

data.name: Z546
data.value: His name is Nathan, Dad. He was able to remember some things. How's the town been since we have been gone?

data.name: Z547
data.value: Calm so far. However, there have been sightings of bandits in the Mushroom Forest.

data.name: Z548
data.value: And rumors that the Bandit King himself has set up camp there.

data.name: Z549
data.value: I have warned all villagers to stay away for the time being.

data.name: Z550
data.value: So your father's the mayor? He must have some pretty nice things...

data.name: Z551
data.value: Dont even think about it!

data.name: Z552
data.value: RAAAAAR!!

data.name: Z553
data.value: Well, we're finally here.

data.name: Z554
data.value: It looks like we're not the only ones here for the artifact. Do you think we're too late?

data.name: Z555
data.value: The bodies are still warm. They were killed recently. If we hurry, we may be able to save someone.

data.name: Z556
data.value: But don't forget, the artifact is still our top priority. Let's go!

data.name: Z557
data.value: Help! Monsters are attacking the castle!

data.name: Z558
data.value: Rar!

data.name: Z559
data.value: BRWWAAAR!!

data.name: Z560
data.value: GRRAAWR!

data.name: Z561
data.value: The Keeper!

data.name: Z562
data.value: He's dead...

data.name: Z563
data.value: But.. Who killed him? And where's the artifact!

data.name: Z564
data.value: Wha...

data.name: Z565
data.value: What's happening? Sid! Max!

data.name: Z566
data.value: Heh... heh... heh... heh... You fools...

data.name: Z567
data.value: Who are you? Fight, coward!

data.name: Z568
data.value: Oh, Nathan... Do you really think you can beat me? Your friends are dead, Nathan.

data.name: Z569
data.value: What a naive boy. You truly think you stand a chance against my power.

data.name: Z570
data.value: Enough of this nonsense! Show yourself, this instant!

data.name: Z571
data.value: Heh heh heh heh... As you command, boy...

data.name: Z572
data.value: I didn't plan on you being here Nathan, but it doesn't matter now. Prepare to join your friends in the afterlife!

data.name: Z573
data.value: It is time for you to witness my power!

data.name: Z574
data.value: Maybe you will be able to figure out how to get my gold.

data.name: Z575
data.value: So, you cleansed the library. Thank you, young travelers. You may go now.

data.name: Z576
data.value: Hold it! you said that you were going to tell us something important.

data.name: Z577
data.value: Important?

data.name: Z578
data.value: Oh yes, now I remember.

data.name: Z579
data.value: You must forgive me, my memory is not what it used to be.

data.name: Z580
data.value: If I were only twenty years younger I...

data.name: Z581
data.value: You would still be ancient. Now get on with it, old man!

data.name: Z582
data.value: As you wish, impatient one.

data.name: Z583
data.value: Hmmm...

data.name: Z584
data.value: Ah yes, here it is. The Legend of the Lacuna Blades.

data.name: Z585
data.value: The story of these swords begins in a time long forgotten, when our two great continents, Ellaethia and Agora, were one.

data.name: Z586
data.value: During this time, magic was much more commonplace than it is today.

data.name: Z587
data.value: Every individual possessed the ability to control magic, not just a select few.

data.name: Z588
data.value: Magic was practiced constantly, and often abused.

data.name: Z589
data.value: This over-use of magic attracted an evil from the darkest corner of the void.

data.name: Z590
data.value: The demon known as Mal'ticar.

data.name: Z591
data.value: This malevolent demon craved magical energy.

data.name: Z592
data.value: It would pass from town to town in its search for new sources of magic, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake.

data.name: Z593
data.value: Its thirst for power could never be satisfied.

data.name: Z594
data.value: In a desperate attempt to escape, a large number of villagers sought refuge in the northern part of the continent.

data.name: Z595
data.value: With their combined strength, they cast a spell that cleaved the land in two.

data.name: Z596
data.value: This created a natural ocean barrier between them and Mal'ticar.

data.name: Z597
data.value: Those who were not fortunate enough to flee to the north were trapped on the newly created southern continent with Mal'ticar.

data.name: Z598
data.value: These people were forced to come together to fight off the demon.

data.name: Z599
data.value: With remarkable ingenuity, the natives of the southern continent imbued all of their magical energy into several swords.

data.name: Z600
data.value: These swords had the power to cut the very fabric of space.

data.name: Z601
data.value: They were called Lacuna Blades.

data.name: Z602
data.value: And those who were chosen to wield the blades were given the name Lacuna Reavers.

data.name: Z603
data.value: A group of these Lacuna Reavers used their swords to cut a rift in space and sealed Mal'ticar in another dimension for all time.

data.name: Z604
data.value: Thousands of years has passed since those dark times, and the Lacuna Reavers were forgotten.

data.name: Z605
data.value: And the Lacuna Blades were lost forever.

data.name: Z606
data.value: Until now.

data.name: Z607
data.value: Nathan, the sword you carry is one of the fabled Lacuna Blades.

data.name: Z608
data.value: Remember this name, Nathan, for it shall help you unlock the true potential of your sword.

data.name: Z609
data.value: I am one of the last people alive who understands the power of this sword.

data.name: Z610
data.value: And, the only one in this village who can teach you the power it holds within - the power to tear rifts in space.

data.name: Z611
data.value: Now we're talkin'. Go ahead, I'm ready.

data.name: Z612
data.value: Not you, idiot! He's talking to Nathan. Havn't you been listening?

data.name: Z613
data.value: I drift in an' out.

data.name: Z614
data.value: Nathan! Young Lacuna Reaver. Are you ready to learn the Lacuna Rift?

data.name: Z615
data.value: Then here we go!

data.name: Z616
data.value: You have learned a new spell - The Lacuna Rift! With this spell you can teleport back to any town you have visited.

data.name: Z617
data.value: That spell took a lot out of me. I must rest now. Safe journeys, young travelers...

data.name: Z618
data.value: Oh, one more thing!

data.name: Z619
data.value: Please, not another story...

data.name: Z620
data.value: The Lacuna Blade has power in its hilt, that is why you can now perform the Lacuna Rift.

data.name: Z621
data.value: However, its true power rests in its blade.

data.name: Z622
data.value: I can see that your blade has been damaged and repaired. It lost much of its power.

data.name: Z623
data.value: You must seek out the master blacksmith in Snowy Ridge.

data.name: Z624
data.value: Only this blacksmith has the skills to repair your sword back to its true form. Be wary of the monsters near the ridge, you may not be able to defeat them in your current state.

data.name: Z625
data.value: It has been an honor meeting a Lacuna Reaver. Have a safe journey.

data.name: Z626
data.value: Nathan, not only are you royalty, but now we have found out that you are some kind of legend. You are really handsome!

data.name: Z627
data.value: Uhh... I mean, awesome!

data.name: Z628
data.value: I don't know about you two, but I thought that was easy.

data.name: Z629
data.value: Get over yourself already!

data.name: Z630
data.value: Nathan, we should go tell Endor that we cleansed the library.

data.name: Z631
data.value: How did you find me!?

data.name: Z632
data.value: It's not possible that you could find me here.

data.name: Z633
data.value: I don't know what you are talking about or even who you are. As you can plainly see, I'm blind.

data.name: Z634
data.value: I know that. I'm the one who did it, you idiot.

data.name: Z635
data.value: So you're the one we saw running away. Why did you do it?

data.name: Z636
data.value: I take it this thief didn't tell you the entire story.

data.name: Z637
data.value: I cursed him with blindness because he was trying to steal my staff!

data.name: Z638
data.value: Lies! All lies!

data.name: Z639
data.value: Save it! You know it's true!

data.name: Z640
data.value: Well, I guess I should thank you. Your curse also seems to have granted me the ability to defend myself in combat.

data.name: Z641
data.value: I surely would be dead otherwise.

data.name: Z642
data.value: What are you talking about!

data.name: Z643
data.value: I intended for you to die in that forest. The curse was designed for blindness, that's all!

data.name: Z644
data.value: In that case! Lets finish what we started in the forest.

data.name: Z645
data.value: Wait!!!

data.name: Z646
data.value: Could it really be?

data.name: Z647
data.value: By the stars, it is!

data.name: Z648
data.value: Son, do you have any idea what that sword is?

data.name: Z649
data.value: You hold in your hand one of the legendary Lacuna Blades.

data.name: Z650
data.value: That's a myth! No one believes in those old wives tales.

data.name: Z651
data.value: It is no longer a myth! As this young man here has proven to us.

data.name: Z652
data.value: The crest on his hilt is unmistakable. And I can sense a great power that lies dormant within.

data.name: Z653
data.value: This is indeed one of the legendary Lacuna Blades.

data.name: Z654
data.value: I dont believe it! No doubt it's an ordinary sword that was stolen from an innocent man.

data.name: Z655
data.value: These people are crooks, Endor!

data.name: Z656
data.value: Somehow they found our secret city and are planning to steal everything we own.

data.name: Z657
data.value: That's not true! We are on a peacful journey to find our friend Nathan's identity. You see he lost his memory when...

data.name: Z658
data.value: Don't listen to them!

data.name: Z659
data.value: I say we destroy them now! We cannot allow them to tell others where we are.

data.name: Z660
data.value: Enough, Ruith!

data.name: Z661
data.value: I will have no more talk of that. I sense no malicious intent from our... visitors.

data.name: Z662
data.value: However, I am curious on how you discovered our hideaway.

data.name: Z663
data.value: Sir. We simply followed our blind friend here.

data.name: Z664
data.value: Will accidently stumbled upon your secret entrance into the cliff face.

data.name: Z665
data.value: Accidently you say? Hmmm...

data.name: Z666
data.value: Highly doubtful.

data.name: Z667
data.value: Is there anything more you would like to add to her story young man?

data.name: Z668
data.value: Well actually...

data.name: Z669
data.value: I had a strong sensation that there was something beyond the cliff face.

data.name: Z670
data.value: I can't explain it. It's as if I was being pulled.

data.name: Z671
data.value: I didn't mention this before because it just sounded stupid.

data.name: Z672
data.value: It dosen't sound stupid to me young man. In fact, it sounds quite profound.

data.name: Z673
data.value: This sensation you felt is what only the most gifted mages feel when they come into close vicinity to this place.

data.name: Z674
data.value: Are you saying that I am a mage?

data.name: Z675
data.value: But I have never possessed any magic.

data.name: Z676
data.value: I think I can explain that.

data.name: Z677
data.value: Sometimes people are born with magic that lies dormant inside them.

data.name: Z678
data.value: These rare individuals can go on their entire lives without even knowing they possess it.

data.name: Z679
data.value: It is not until a great need awakens it.

data.name: Z680
data.value: Survival, in your case.

data.name: Z681
data.value: When I blinded you in the forest you were at your most desperate state.

data.name: Z682
data.value: This must have been the catalyst.

data.name: Z683
data.value: So that is why Will is able to fight so well.

data.name: Z684
data.value: Exactly, young healer.

data.name: Z685
data.value: Hmmm, What are the odds of finding a latent mage traveling with a Lacuna Reaver?

data.name: Z686
data.value: Lacuna Reaver???

data.name: Z687
data.value: Endor! Endor! Help!

data.name: Z688
data.value: Calm down son. What is it?

data.name: Z689
data.value: One of the students experiments has gone horribly wrong!

data.name: Z690
data.value: And now the library is... is...

data.name: Z691
data.value: POSSESSED!!!

data.name: Z692
data.value: Is everyone out of the building?

data.name: Z693
data.value: Yes.

data.name: Z694
data.value: What are we going to do? What are we going to do?

data.name: Z695
data.value: There are monsters all over the place.

data.name: Z696
data.value: Endor, Let us help. I'm sure Nathan, Will and I can take care of this.

data.name: Z697
data.value: Hmmm. As you wish. Your help will be most grateful.

data.name: Z698
data.value: Endor! Is it wise to let these strangers loose in our sacred library?

data.name: Z699
data.value: Ruith, if you are still skeptical, then what better way for them to prove themselves. I will allow this.

data.name: Z700
data.value: And young travelers, if you are successful in ridding the library from the creatures, come find me.

data.name: Z701
data.value: I will reward you with knowledge that may help you on your quest.

data.name: Z702
data.value: Thank you, sir. We won't let you down.

data.name: Z703
data.value: Nathan, I worry about him as well.

data.name: Z704
data.value: It is not healthy for a man to lock himself away with only his obsessions to keep him company.

data.name: Z705
data.value: Promise me that you will never turn out this way.

data.name: Z706
data.value: Nathan! You passed out again. Did you have another flashback?

data.name: Z707
data.value: Nathan, if you're ok, I think we should proceed. I sense that the source of the disturbance is through this bookcase.

data.name: Z708
data.value: So, this is what's causing the paranormal activities.

data.name: Z709
data.value: It doesn't look so tough.

data.name: Z710
data.value: Here it comes. Be careful, Nathan!

data.name: Z711
data.value: Tippers!? Why would you hurt Tippers like that? He never did anything to hurt you!

data.name: Z712
data.value: He doesn't look that bad...

data.name: Z713
data.value: Oh sure, because you can see her teddy! You're looking the wrong way by the way.

data.name: Z714
data.value: Ouch, I'm just trying to cheer her up.

data.name: Z715
data.value: Tippers!? He's okay! He says you guys are strong warriors, and he would like to offer you some advice.
data.comment: Previous version: Tippers!? He's okay! He says you guys are strong warriors, and he will be there for you when you need him.

data.name: Z716
data.value: Tippers says the page you found has unknown magical powers. Reading the page will give you unimaginable knowledge of magic.
data.comment: Previous version: Tippers says the page you found will allow you to summon him during your perilous moments.

data.name: Z717
data.value: Seems like my type of magic. I'll put the page in my book. How do you know what perilous means?

data.name: Z718
data.value: Tippers told me, He's really smart. I need to find him a doctor though, I don't want him to bleed out.

data.name: Z719
data.value: I would say she's weird, but I don't want to get attacked by another one of her toys, or more furniture.

data.name: Z720
data.value: Let's get out of here.

data.name: Z721
data.value: ....outrageous! Outsiders aren't allowed in Celindar! Everyone knows that!

data.name: Z722
data.value: Ruith, you need to calm yourself. These aren't just any outsiders. They carry the weight of destiny on their shoulders.

data.name: Z723
data.value: We need to help them any way we can.

data.name: Z724
data.value: Haven't you seen that thief they travel with?! He's scum. He never should have made it out of that forest.

data.name: Z725
data.value: I think you underestimate him. He has the potential for greatness in him.

data.name: Z726
data.value: He just needs to learn how to control himself.

data.name: Z727
data.value: Hold on. I'm sensing something here.

data.name: Z728
data.value: It's just a big cliff face. I don't think your skills can work everywhere Will.

data.name: Z729
data.value: Just let me look around real quick.

data.name: Z730
data.value: I know there's something weird going on here. I don't know how you guys aren't feeling this too.

data.name: Z731
data.value: I think I'm getting warmer!

data.name: Z732
data.value: Just get back here Will! Let Nathan lead the way. He can solve any problem.

data.name: Z733
data.value: Will! Don't move, I'm coming!

data.name: Z734
data.value: How do you know where you're going? It's pitch black in here!

data.name: Z735
data.value: It's always pitch black in my case! Shut up and follow me.

data.name: Z736
data.value: This feels weird. I feel like I'm turning upside down.

data.name: Z737
data.value: Hey, didn't I tell you to shut up?

data.name: Z738
data.value: I know what you mean though, something doesn't feel right.

data.name: Z739
data.value: It's this way, follow me!

data.name: Z740
data.value: This is strange. I've gained some vision ever since we entered this cavern.

data.name: Z741
data.value: These magic lanterns around town must have something to do with it.

data.name: Z742
data.value: Now is my chance to get some revenge on that stupid mage Ruith.

data.name: Z743
data.value: I'll make him regret the day he decided to take away my sight!

data.name: Z744
data.value: Are you serious!?

data.name: Z745
data.value: We should give her a piece of our mind! Making us go into the library like that, just to treat us with disrespect!

data.name: Z746
data.value: What happened to this place?

data.name: Z747
data.value: Someone inside might need help.

data.name: Z748
data.value: This place is a mess.

data.name: Z749
data.value: Nathan, look! An anvil!

data.name: Z750
data.value: A blacksmith must live here.

data.name: Z751
data.value: I wonder what happened to him?

data.name: Z752
data.value: I sense that there was someone with a massive power here.

data.name: Z753
data.value: There must of been some kind of struggle between it and the blacksmith.

data.name: Z754
data.value: Are you saying the blacksmith could have been kidnapped?

data.name: Z755
data.value: It's possible.

data.name: Z756
data.value: We should try to find him.

data.name: Z757
data.value: He could be our only chance to restore Nathan's sword.

data.name: Z758
data.value: Maybe we should have given the job to my brother.

data.name: Z759
data.value: No! Nathan's single act of negligence shouldn't relieve him of the responsibility he's always dreamt about.

data.name: Z760
data.value: I suppose you're right, I just fear Nathan will make a poor mistake. My brother is much more noble than Nathan.

data.name: Z761
data.value: Nathan will learn in good time. I'm sure you were the same when you were younger.

data.name: Z762
data.value: That's true, it's the only way he can learn. My brother's too old to have that weight on his shoulders anyway.

data.name: Z763
data.value: Besides, his obsessions of late have kept him busy.

data.name: Z764
data.value: I can't even remmeber the last time I saw him out of that study.

data.name: Z765
data.value: So it is decided. Nathan. As a Lacuna Reaver, the fate of House Verithus is entrusted to you.

data.name: Z766
data.value: Nathan, I worry about him as well.

data.name: Z767
data.value: It is not healthy for a man to lock himself away with only his obsessions to keep him company.

data.name: Z768
data.value: I think its time that I find out what he spends all his time researching. His studies have changed him, somehow.

data.name: Z769
data.value: You are safe now.

data.name: Z770
data.value: Thank you for saving me. How did you know where I live?

data.name: Z771
data.value: That demon abducted me and forced me to craft powerful weapons for him.

data.name: Z772
data.value: That's awful.

data.name: Z773
data.value: Is there any way that I can repay you kind people?

data.name: Z774
data.value: Gold! And lots of it.

data.name: Z775
data.value: Shut up, Will!

data.name: Z776
data.value: Don't pay him any mind.

data.name: Z777
data.value: However, we are in desperate need of your services.

data.name: Z778
data.value: Yes, anything. What can I do for you?

data.name: Z779
data.value: Our friend Nathan has a very special sword that needs to be restored.

data.name: Z780
data.value: It's called a Lacuna Blade. Ever heard of it?

data.name: Z781
data.value: Lacuna Blade! It cant be.

data.name: Z782
data.value: So you have heard of it!

data.name: Z783
data.value: Well of course. I'm the one who forged it.

data.name: Z784
data.value: No way! We were told this thing was created centuries ago.

data.name: Z785
data.value: You can't possibly be that old!

data.name: Z786
data.value: I'm afraid I am.

data.name: Z787
data.value: The magic required to make these blades had an unforeseen side effect on me.

data.name: Z788
data.value: I was exposed to unimaginable amounts of magic extending my life well past what you consider normal.

data.name: Z789
data.value: The last time I saw this sword, it was being entrusted to the House of Verithus.

data.name: Z790
data.value: Verithus!?

data.name: Z791
data.value: Nathan! Nathan!

data.name: Z792
data.value: Are you ok?

data.name: Z793
data.value: Did you have another flashback?

data.name: Z794
data.value: Yes. I remember everything now.

data.name: Z795
data.value: That's great!

data.name: Z796
data.value: Arlan!

data.name: Z797
data.value: It was my uncle, Arlan.

data.name: Z798
data.value: He was once a noble man respected by everyone in our kingdom.

data.name: Z799
data.value: However, he became obsessed with obtaining power.

data.name: Z800
data.value: He would lock himself in his study for days searching for a way to make himself stronger.

data.name: Z801
data.value: Then one day, he came across a sacred, dark ritual that has been taboo for centuries.

data.name: Z802
data.value: My father found out about it and ordered me to stop him.

data.name: Z803
data.value: I took two of my best knights with me to search for him in the tower where you found me unconscious.

data.name: Z804
data.value: He killed them and almost killed me.

data.name: Z805
data.value: Nathan...

data.name: Z806
data.value: The manuscripts of that ritual were suppose to be destroyed long ago.

data.name: Z807
data.value: What was the ritual for?

data.name: Z808
data.value: I take it you are familiar with the legend of the Lacuna Reavers?

data.name: Z809
data.value: Yes, a mage named Endor told us about it.

data.name: Z810
data.value: He was the one who sent us to find you.

data.name: Z811
data.value: Endor you say? He and I have been friends for a long time.

data.name: Z812
data.value: So, what about the legend?

data.name: Z813
data.value: Well sometime after the great divide of the continent.

data.name: Z814
data.value: Some of the people trapped on Agora believed it to be impossible to stop Mal'ticar.

data.name: Z815
data.value: Instead, they thought the best way to survive would be to join him.

data.name: Z816
data.value: Mal'ticar turned most of them into terrible demons and used them as slaves.

data.name: Z817
data.value: And the remaining few, he promised great power if they would help him search for the mages that sought to destroy him.

data.name: Z818
data.value: Once Mal'ticar was locked away by the Lacuna Reavers, a small group of these loyalists wanted Mal'ticar back.

data.name: Z819
data.value: So they devised a sacred ritual to release him from his interdimensional prison and bring him back to our world.

data.name: Z820
data.value: The Lacuna Reavers found out about this and set out to destroy these individuals and their manuscripts.

data.name: Z821
data.value: But somehow one of the manuscripts must have survived.

data.name: Z822
data.value: However, there is still hope. I have heard it said that it takes weeks for the ritual to be completed.

data.name: Z823
data.value: So we still have time. Can you help us stop my uncle before he completes the ritual?

data.name: Z824
data.value: All I can do is restore your blade to its full power.

data.name: Z825
data.value: But I am not sure if one Lacuna Blade will be enough to stop him.

data.name: Z826
data.value: I have to try!

data.name: Z827
data.value: Okay, then. Here it goes.

data.name: Z828
data.value: Your Lacuna Blade has been restored to its full power.

data.name: Z829
data.value: Now that your blade is fully restored. I suggest you first head back to Celindar.

data.name: Z830
data.value: If I know Endor, he has already devised a plan that will help you.

data.name: Z831
data.value: Thank you.

data.name: Z832
data.value: No, thank you, Lacuna Reaver. It has been an honor to serve the prince of the House of Verithus.

data.name: Z833
data.value: Wow! this place is enormous.

data.name: Z834
data.value: We could be lost forever in here.

data.name: Z835
data.value: That same massive power I sensed earlier is emanating from somewhere in here.

data.name: Z836
data.value: Well, then I guess we have no choice but to search for it in this labyrinth.

data.name: Z837
data.value: There it is! That massive power is directly in front of me.

data.name: Z838
data.value: Nathan look! There's a girl back there. We have to free her.

data.name: Z839
data.value: Why did you kidnap this poor woman?

data.name: Z840
data.value: You come into my lair and have the audacity to question me?

data.name: Z841
data.value: Let her go! Or else...

data.name: Z842
data.value: MUHAHAHA!!!

data.name: Z843
data.value: You blind fool.

data.name: Z844
data.value: You will all pay for your impudence!!!

data.name: Z845
data.value: Hold up! Who is this girl, Nathan?

data.name: Z846
data.value: Oh sure, that's how they all act when they've been caught!

data.name: Z847
data.value: Saving a girl from a tower, why didn't you tell me! I can't believe the nerve of some men!

data.name: Z848
data.value: Stop! This isn't what you think it is. Nathan saved my life from monsters when we met.

data.name: Z849
data.value: I was cornered when Nathan slayed the monsters and let me escape the tower.

data.name: Z850
data.value: He's the reason why I'm alive and why I'm reunited with my family.

data.name: Z851
data.value: Wait, so Nathan isn't cheating on me, and he's a hero?

data.name: Z852
data.value: I'll just add that to the list of great things about Nathan in my diary.

data.name: Z853
data.value: I never properly thanked you for saving me that day.

data.name: Z854
data.value: Please, take this. I won't take no for an answer.

data.name: Z855
data.value: You received Earthen Gloves.

data.name: Z856
data.value: Some goddess. She wasn't so tough.

data.name: Z857
data.value: Nathan, Lets go see if the villagers are feeling better.

data.name: Z858
data.value: You have saved our town. When you defeated Chepetawa, her curse dissipated almost instantly.

data.name: Z859
data.value: Here, please take this as a token of my gratitude.

data.name: Z860
data.value: You received a Ring of the Divine.

data.name: Z861
data.value: Why is she giving that to Nathan? I am the one who did all of the work.

data.name: Z862
data.value: Ha! you wish!

data.name: Z863
data.value: How dare you enter my domain! Be gone, insects!

data.name: Z864
data.value: We are here to stop you!

data.name: Z865
data.value: Stop me! MUHAHAHA! Impossible!

data.name: Z866
data.value: I get it now. That old crone sent you here, didn't she.

data.name: Z867
data.value: She told us you were a good person once. What happened to you?

data.name: Z868
data.value: Ha! don't make me laugh. I never cared for them at all.

data.name: Z869
data.value: It was all an act to fool the Shaper into giving me power.

data.name: Z870
data.value: And now that I have it. I intend to use it, to make this world mine!

data.name: Z871
data.value: Okay, you're starting to annoy me. It's time for you to die now.

data.name: Z872
data.value: How dare you!

data.name: Z873
data.value: Rise, Boggimus!

data.name: Z874
data.value: ROAR!!!!

data.name: Z875
data.value: Now, feel my wrath, insects!

data.name: Z876
data.value: Who.. who...

data.name: Z877
data.value: Who are you?

data.name: Z878
data.value: We are just travelers passing through.

data.name: Z879
data.value: What has happened to your town?

data.name: Z880
data.value: This is awful.

data.name: Z881
data.value: Che..Che..

data.name: Z882
data.value: Chepetawa!

data.name: Z883
data.value: It is all Chepetawa's doing.

data.name: Z884
data.value: Who is Chepetawa?

data.name: Z885
data.value: Chepetawa is one of the divine daughters of our god, the Shaper.

data.name: Z886
data.value: Unlike the Shaper's other children, she is the only one that is mortal.

data.name: Z887
data.value: Although Chepetawa had no supernatural gifts, she possesses an intellect beyond a normal human.

data.name: Z888
data.value: She used this skill to help our village thrive and prosper.

data.name: Z889
data.value: The Shaper took notice of the good deeds she performed for our village and decided to reward her with god-like power.

data.name: Z890
data.value: However, this power made her corrupt.

data.name: Z891
data.value: She cursed our town with a great plague that wiped out most of our villagers.

data.name: Z892
data.value: The few that are still alive do not have much time left, myself included...

data.name: Z893
data.value: I just don't understand why she would turn on her own people.

data.name: Z894
data.value: You must help us.

data.name: Z895
data.value: What can we do?

data.name: Z896
data.value: You must seek out Chepetawa in the Sewn Bog just north of here and destroy her!

data.name: Z897
data.value: Only then will the curse be lifted.

data.name: Z898
data.value: But be careful. People who travel into the Sewn bog are known to be lost forever.

data.name: Z899
data.value: And Chepetawa's powers are great. She will not be an easy enemy.

data.name: Z900
data.value: Dont worry, ma'am. We will stop Chepetawa and save your village.

data.name: Z901
data.value: I can't leave now. I still need to find a gift for Nathan.

data.name: Z902
data.value: I think that was enough shopping for me tonight.

data.name: Z903
data.value: Nathan better appreciate this gift after what I went through to get it. If only he knew how much I...

data.name: Z904
data.value: Nathan! You just passed out what happened?

data.name: Z905
data.value: ... You had a flashback? You come from a family of royalty?! I like wealthy and powerful men.

data.name: Z906
data.value: Nevermind. It seems like the sight of this mansion triggered your flashback. Do you know what this means?

data.name: Z907
data.value: Maybe during our travels, we can discover more secrets of your past! You must have an unknown agenda.

data.name: Z908
data.value: Okay, let's press forward and we'll see what else we can find.

data.name: Z909
data.value: Nathan! What took you so long!? You need to be more responsible. Being the prince is no easy job.

data.name: Z910
data.value: As prince, you have to take on my responsibility if anything were to happen to me.

data.name: Z911
data.value: Your Father is right son, you have something that's been passed down through generations of ancestors.
