data.name: Z912
data.value: You need to keep it safe because you're the only one who can defeat him if he were to return.

data.name: Z913
data.value: The sound of that gives me chills.

data.name: Z914
data.value: Maybe we should have given the job to my brother.

data.name: Z915
data.value: No! Nathan's single act of negligence shouldn't relieve him of the responsibility he's always dreamt about.

data.name: Z916
data.value: I suppose you're right, I just fear Nathan will make a poor mistake. My brother is much more noble than Nathan.

data.name: Z917
data.value: Nathan will learn in good time. I'm sure you were the same when you were younger.

data.name: Z918
data.value: That's true, it's the only way he can learn. My brother's too old to have that weight on his shoulders anyways.

data.name: Z919
data.value: Sorry, sir. The master doesn't want anymore visitors at this time.

data.name: Z920
data.value: I can't believe this! I have been robbed again!

data.name: Z921
data.value: Is there anything we can do to help?

data.name: Z922
data.value: Who are you? Well, it doesn't matter. I guess you could help.

data.name: Z923
data.value: I saw that cowardly thief run into the forest behind my house. If you can catch him, there will be a nice reward for you!

data.name: Z924
data.value: Don't worry, Sir! Nathan and I will get him for you.

data.name: Z925
data.value: I'm gonna go out on a limb here and say that purse he was holding wasn't his.

data.name: Z926
data.value: I really hate when men think they can just go around taking what isn't theirs!

data.name: Z927
data.value: If it were my purse he was trying to steal, I would have taught him a lesson or two.

data.name: Z928
data.value: Lets go find him before he gets away.

data.name: Z929
data.value: How does he keep getting away like that? This guy is really strange.

data.name: Z930
data.value: Well I'm glad that's over. Let's get this purse back to its owner. She should be somewhere in town.

data.name: Z931
data.value: I've always wanted to visit Tamarel, the shopping capital of Ellaethia. I can't wait to find a gift for Nathan.

data.name: Z932
data.value: I better hurry before he starts wondering where I've disappeared to.

data.name: Z933
data.value: Well that's kinda weird. He must have me mistaken for someone else. Hehe.

data.name: Z934
data.value: We can't leave until we repair my weapon!

data.name: Z935
data.value: We can't just let him get killed. We have to help!

data.name: Z936
data.value: Did you see that!

data.name: Z937
data.value: It's as if losing my sight somehow awakend a fighting spirit within me.

data.name: Z938
data.value: This is amazing!

data.name: Z939
data.value: Oh no! I got so carried away that I broke my weapon.

data.name: Z940
data.value: As amazing as this all may be. You're still a thief! And you must pay for your crime.

data.name: Z941
data.value: It is our duty to take you back. Do not try to resist.

data.name: Z942
data.value: We captured your thief, sir.

data.name: Z943
data.value: Before we found him he was attacked. Someone blinded him.

data.name: Z944
data.value: HAHAHAHA! Justice in its finest form!

data.name: Z945
data.value: No doubt the attacker was someone else he had wronged.

data.name: Z946
data.value: His blindness is a befitting punishment. Now he is in no condition to steal from anyone ever again.

data.name: Z947
data.value: Therefore, I will not have him arrested.

data.name: Z948
data.value: Here is your reward for helping me.

data.name: Z949
data.value: You received a Ring of Justice.

data.name: Z950
data.value: You received

data.name: Z951
data.value: gold pieces and a Ring of Justice.

data.name: Z952
data.value: You are lucky that man was kind enough to let you off the hook. What will you do now?

data.name: Z953
data.value: Hmmm?... I think I will join you on your journey for awhile.

data.name: Z954
data.value: After all, you did help me with defeating that burtle. And I don't like being indebted to anyone.

data.name: Z955
data.value: My name is Will, and my new found fighting skills will prove to be invaluable.

data.name: Z956
data.value: You should count yourselves fortunate that a fighter of my caliber is on your team.

data.name: Z957
data.value: Don't blow your own horn too hard. After all, you are talking to a wall.

data.name: Z958
data.value: Uhh... I knew that.

data.name: Z959
data.value: Will has joined your party!

data.name: Z960
data.value: Nathan, look!

data.name: Z961
data.value: The thief is in such a hurry, he must be unaware that the stolen items are dropping out of his bag.

data.name: Z962
data.value: AAAAAHHHH!

data.name: Z963
data.value: What was that?! Sounded like it came from just ahead of us.

data.name: Z964
data.value: We better go check it out.

data.name: Z965
data.value: Oh no! He woke up a Burtle!

data.name: Z966
data.value: We found the thief! But I sense that he is hurt.

data.name: Z967
data.value: That bastard blinded me!

data.name: Z968
data.value: Where did he go?!

data.name: Z969
data.value: I will find you!

data.name: Z970
data.value: Oh no! He needs our help!

data.name: Z971
data.value: AHHH! Demons! This is the end!

data.name: Z972
data.value: Everyone, calm down! Look, it's Nathan! Our prince has returned!

data.name: Z973
data.value: But, Nathan, what happened? We thought you were dead.

data.name: Z974
data.value: Nathan, Arlan has grown mad with power! The King and Queen, your mother and father... they're dead...

data.name: Z975
data.value: Good people, today, Arlan will suffer for what he has done! He will beg for mercy with his dying breath.

data.name: Z976
data.value: I swear, here and now, that I, Nathan Verithus, heir to the throne of Agora, will stop this tyrant!

data.name: Z977
data.value: Arlan will regret his attempt to overthrow my Kingdom; to overthrow OUR Kingdom!

data.name: Z978
data.value: Your bravery is truly inspiring, my Prince. We will support your cause in any way we can.

data.name: Z979
data.value: Everyone, thank you. I will bring peace back to Agora!

data.name: Z980
data.value: My hero!

data.name: Z981
data.value: Would you cut it out! You're making me feel like a third wheel here!

data.name: Z982
data.value: Let's get going, I hate crowds...

data.name: Z983
data.value: Good, Nathan you are here. We have just finished our preparations.

data.name: Z984
data.value: All you need to do now is summon the power of your Lacuna blade to open the rift.

data.name: Z985
data.value: Once you cross through, we will remain here to keep the rift open so that you will always have a way back.

data.name: Z986
data.value: Nathan, are you ready?

data.name: Z987
data.value: Yes.

data.name: Z988
data.value: This is worse than I expected. The land is... dead. I can't believe I let this happen.

data.name: Z989
data.value: Look at it this way, Nathan. Ruling your kingdom just got a lot easier now that your uncle has killed all your loyal subjects.

data.name: Z990
data.value: Will! This is serious.

data.name: Z991
data.value: Nathan's home has been destroyed. We have to fix this.

data.name: Z992
data.value: Arlan will regret betraying my family and Agora's people. Let's go. We have to finish this.

data.name: Z993
data.value: This door is locked. I need to find two keys to open it.

data.name: Z994
data.value: I still need one more key.

data.name: Z995
data.value: This door is locked. I need to find a key to open it.

data.name: Z996
data.value: Welcome home, Nathan.

data.name: Z997
data.value: Arlan! It's over!

data.name: Z998
data.value: Indeed, it is. For you!

data.name: Z999
data.value: Its time to pay for what you did to me mage!

data.name: ZA001
data.value: Your plan to punish me has only made me stronger. I should probably thank you, but that will have to wait until after I've beaten you to a pulp.

data.name: ZA002
data.value: Hahaha, and here he is to prove my point. So you're here to fight me....how expected.

data.name: ZA003
data.value: Don't you see Endor? He doesn't belong here and neither do his friends. They're just trouble!

data.name: ZA004
data.value: You two must resolve your issues immediately. This is getting out of hand, and I have little patience for this nonsense.

data.name: ZA005
data.value: Ruith, you are not very friendly to say the least, and Will, you are too hot-headed for your own good.

data.name: ZA006
data.value: You both need to agreee to disagree before I have to end this with force.

data.name: ZA007
data.value: I'm not here for you so get out of my way before you get hurt. I'm here to settle the score with Ruith.

data.name: ZA008
data.value: You leave me no choice. You are wrong in trying to attack Ruith. I hate to be so forceful, but it seems this is necessary.

data.name: ZA009
data.value: Prepare yourself, for you are about to face all of your flaws. You must examine yourself, and in so doing, defeat your impurities.

data.name: ZA010
data.value: Ahhhhh!

data.name: ZA011
data.value: Well done, Nathan. *cough* *cough*

data.name: ZA012
data.value: Your father would be proud.

data.name: ZA013
data.value: But don't think you have won yet. The final step in the ritual is a blood sacrifice from the House of Verithus.

data.name: ZA014
data.value: Only our royal blood is potent enough to bring back Mal'Ticar.

data.name: ZA015
data.value: I intended that sacrifice to be you, Nathan.

data.name: ZA016
data.value: But I suppose my blood will suffice!

data.name: ZA017
data.value: Arlan, don't!!!

data.name: ZA018
data.value: Rise, Mal'Ticar!

data.name: ZA019
data.value: At long last, I am free to take over this world once again.

data.name: ZA020
data.value: Oh no! I've never felt such power...

data.name: ZA021
data.value: Arlan... What have you done?

data.name: ZA022
data.value: HAHAHAHAHA! Now the world will bow to me, for I control the greatest power in the universe.

data.name: ZA023
data.value: Mal'Ticar! I have summoned you! Do as I say and destroy these insects!

data.name: ZA024
data.value: Who do you think you are, mortal? You are all insects in my eyes.

data.name: ZA025
data.value: I answer to no one!

data.name: ZA026
data.value: Do you have any idea the trouble I went through to summon you?!

data.name: ZA027
data.value: How could I have been so blind?

data.name: ZA028
data.value: Hey!

data.name: ZA029
data.value: Mal'Ticar's power is growing! We have to do something!

data.name: ZA030
data.value: The world is counting on us now. We have to defeat Mal'Ticar before he comes to his full power.

data.name: ZA031
data.value: We need to force him back into the void before it's too late.

data.name: ZA032
data.value: Nathan's right, lets kick his ...

data.name: ZA033
data.value: Fools! My power is beyond your comprehension. Prepare to be crushed!

data.name: ZA034
data.value: Enough of this!

data.name: ZA035
data.value: Wha...

data.name: ZA036
data.value: Will!, Cara!

data.name: ZA037
data.value: No, not again!

data.name: ZA038
data.value: You will pay!

data.name: ZA039
data.value: Your rage has awakened a new ability in your Lacuna Blade.

data.name: ZA040
data.value: Rift is now an offensive spell!

data.name: ZA041
data.value: Use it to seal Mal'Ticar back into the void, once and for all!

data.name: ZA042
data.value: It's finally over.

data.name: ZA043
data.value: Will...

data.name: ZA044
data.value: Cara...

data.name: ZA045
data.value: Nathan.

data.name: ZA046
data.value: Cara!

data.name: ZA047
data.value: You're alive!

data.name: ZA048
data.value: But, how? I thought...

data.name: ZA049
data.value: I was able to put up a shield right before his last attack.

data.name: ZA050
data.value: It protected me, but the blast still managed to knock me unconscious.

data.name: ZA051
data.value: Where's Mal'Ticar?

data.name: ZA052
data.value: Where he belongs. Sealed up in the void.

data.name: ZA053
data.value: Nathan, you're the greatest!

data.name: ZA054
data.value: Oh, and Will, you're okay too?

data.name: ZA055
data.value: Will?

data.name: ZA056
data.value: Nathan, where's Will?

data.name: ZA057
data.value: Oh, no.

data.name: ZA058
data.value: I couldn't save him.

data.name: ZA059
data.value: It's not your fault, Nathan.

data.name: ZA060
data.value: You saved the world. Will would be proud.

data.name: ZA253
data.value: Come Here, Go Anywhere!

data.name: ZA254
data.value: Who's this handsome guy?

data.name: ZA255
data.value: Well that was interesting...

data.name: ZA256
data.value: I feel like I've learned something. I don't want to kill Ruith quite as much as I did before.

data.name: ZA257
data.value: That would be a side effect from defeating your inner demons.

data.name: ZA258
data.value: You are now using logic, rather than rage and pride, to make your judgements. You still have much room to grow, but it is a start.

data.name: ZA259
data.value: Its about time someone put that stupid thief in his place.

data.name: ZA260
data.value: I would be careful if I were you. You may be next.

data.name: ZA261
data.value: I think I'd better get back to my friends. I have a lot to think about with the whole brain reconfiguration and all.

data.name: ZA262
data.value: This is a big step in realizing your true power. I am very interested to see where life takes you.

data.name: ZA263
data.value: Good luck on your journeys and farewell.

data.name: ZA264
data.value: Will has recieved Amulet of Insight

data.name: ZA265
data.value: You found Medium Tonic X3!

data.name: ZA266
data.value: You found a Ruby Ring and 125 gold!

data.name: ZA267
data.value: You found Medium Potion X3!

data.name: ZA268
data.value: Amulet of Insight

data.name: ZA269
data.value: "True strength comes from within." - Endor

data.name: ZA270
data.value: Strange girl...

data.name: ZA271
data.value: It pleases me to watch you squirm. You have fought with all your might, and still, all will end in ruin.

data.name: ZA272
data.value: As we fought my power grew. Now there is nothing you can do to stop me!

data.name: ZA273
data.value: I'm so sorry Nathan. I was blinded by the power of Mal'Ticar's magic.

data.name: ZA274
data.value: The closer I got to summoning Mal'Ticar, the stronger I became. I never knew that this would be the outcome of my efforts.

data.name: ZA275
data.value: Nathan! Listen closely. I am going to funnel all of my strength and energy into your blade.

data.name: ZA276
data.value: That should give you the power you need to send Mal'Ticar back into the void.

data.name: ZA277
data.value: What will that do to you?

data.name: ZA278
data.value: I won't survive.

data.name: ZA279
data.value: But, I must atone for what I've done. This is the only way!

data.name: ZA280
data.value: Kinda late for the heroics, but we'll take what we can get.

data.name: ZA281
data.value: Don't be so insenstive!

data.name: ZA282
data.value: There is no time to waste! We must do this now!

data.name: ZA283
data.value: Thank you Uncle.

data.name: ZA284
data.value: Hurry Nathan! Send this monster back where he came from!

data.name: ZA285
data.value: It's time to end this.

data.name: ZA512
data.value: Now get out of here. I'm tired of looking at your face.

data.name: ZA513
data.value: For now, take this plain armor. We can't have you guys running around here naked now can we. HA!HA!

data.name: ZA514
data.value: Plain Armor

data.name: ZA515
data.value: Plain armor. It is thin and flimsy.

data.name: ZA516
data.value: Sire!?

data.name: ZA517
data.value: I have a plan to save Agora from your uncle. I've obtained three legendary items that should guarantee my success.

data.name: ZA518
data.value: You have to stop your uncle!

data.name: ZA519
data.value: Its good to have you back sire.

data.name: ZA520
data.value: My condolences Prince Nathan. Your parents were the greatest king and queen in history.

data.name: ZA521
data.value: By the stars! Our prince has returned.

data.name: ZA522
data.value: You received a Translucent Ring and 450 gold pieces.

data.name: ZA523
data.value: You received 450 gold pieces.

data.name: ZA524
data.value: The crab summons a razor-sharp pillar below it's target.

data.name: ZA526
data.value: Drains the energy from the soul, replenishing the life of the caster and steals their strength.

data.name: ZA527
data.value: You received Earthen Gloves and 300 gold pieces.

data.name: ZA528
data.value: We shouldn't steal.

data.name: ZA529
data.value: Your game has been saved.

data.name: ZA530
data.value: A strange energy surrounds you.

data.name: ZA531
data.value: You feel rejuvinated.

data.name: ZA532
data.value: This can't be your house. A blacksmith we're looking for lives here. We think he's in trouble.

data.name: ZA533
data.value: Well then it seems you've found who you were searching for. I am your missing blacksmith.

data.name: ZA534
data.value: Ha! How is this girl supposed to be a master blacksmith?

data.name: ZA535
data.value: Why are you doing this? Are you working with Arlan?

data.name: ZA536
data.value: I am Arlan you poor, defenseless, nephew of mine. Now that I have the artifact, I can finally resurrect Mal'ticar.

data.name: ZA537
data.value: You never should have come here. You never stood a chance against me.

data.name: ZA538
data.value: My father sent me to find you after he learned your intentions. Neither of us could have imagined what you were becoming. Can't you see how this evil has twisted you?

data.name: ZA539
data.value: I have greater power than you can imagine. By summoning Mal'ticar I can join with him and finally be out from under my brother's shadow.

data.name: ZA540
data.value: You're just a pathetic shell of the the man my uncle was. My uncle was a wise and loving man. He was nothing like you.

data.name: ZA541
data.value: I have enjoyed our talk, but I have a world to conquer. Take comfort in knowing that your family will soon be joining you in the afterlife.

data.name: ZA542
data.value: You found 150 gold!

data.name: ZA543
data.value: You found a Large Tonic X3!

data.name: ZA544
data.value: Maybe, if you prove your worth, I will lend you these items so you might defeat your uncle instead.

data.name: ZA545
data.value: There are 30 hidden marks in the Forbidden Cavern to the east of our camp. There are 10 marks for three different sets. I will give you an item for each complete set of marks you find. Good luck!

data.value: I will use what power I have left to unblock the entrance to the Sewn bog.

data.name: ZA574
data.value: Hey Jeremiah!

data.name: ZA575
data.value: What's up Franky D?

data.name: ZA576
data.value: This fella' thinks he can break into our hideout. And how many times did I tell you to stop calling me that!

data.name: ZA577
data.value: Sorry Lenny. Do you think he know about the treasure?

data.name: ZA578
data.value: He does now! He knows too much, let's kill him!

data.name: ZA579
data.value: They killed our pawns! Time for plan B.

data.name: ZA580
data.value: Wait... We have a plan B?

data.name: ZA581
data.value: ... The trees you imbecile!

data.name: ZA582
data.value: Trees!? You think trees are gonna kill these guys!? They're trees! You know what trees are right?

data.name: ZA583
data.value: Just send in the trees!

data.name: ZA584
data.value: They defeated our secret weapons! We need to send in the four elite members of the guild!

data.name: ZA585
data.value: But Gary! What if-

data.name: ZA586
data.value: That's Gary sir to you Bruno!

data.name: ZA587
data.value: Sorry. Gary sir, what if-

data.name: ZA588
data.value: Hmm, I think I like sir Gary better. Or maybe sir Gary sir!

data.name: ZA589
data.value: I like that a lot actually.

data.name: ZA590
data.value: Well we're in a bit of a predicament here I think.

data.name: ZA591
data.value: What's the problem Sam?

data.name: ZA592
data.value: Where do I begin. Most of the guild has been killed by these punks, our strongest team was killed, and now most of the ghosts are running rampant due to sudden loss of guild members.

data.name: ZA593
data.value: Our guild was taken down all because we had to protect this chest? It's not even worth dying for!

data.name: ZA594
data.value: Well we have no choice now. We're trapped now, might as well die as heroes protecting the most ancient treasure of all treasures.

data.name: ZA595
data.value: We're running out of options here. What do you suggest Antonio?

data.name: ZA596
data.value: Well we have these ghosts that we've tamed to help us out.

data.name: ZA597
data.value: We have a ghost taming division in our guild?

data.name: ZA598
data.value: Of course! Some of the guild thought our ghost hunting division was immoral, so we tame them now.

data.name: ZA599
data.value: We had a ghost hunting division in our guild? Nobody tells me nothin'. Well send them in!

data.name: ZA600
data.value: Mysterious Page

data.name: ZA601
data.value: I can't thank you enough for saving my friend. She's upstairs if you'd like to talk to her.

data.name: ZA602
data.value: Hey you're that soldier that left my friend to those monsters back at the keep. I'll never forgive you for not saving her.

data.name: ZA603
data.value: You recieved 400 gold pieces.

data.name: ZA604
data.value: So you solved my riddle! Well that was an easy one. Lets try one more.

data.value: You found 2000 gold!

data.name: ZA616
data.value: Now that your sword has been restored, you need armor befitting a Lacuna Reaver. I'm sure I have something lying around here somewhere...

data.name: ZA617
data.value: Ah! Here it is.

data.name: ZA618
data.value: You have received Obsidian Armor.

data.name: ZA619
data.value: You have received a Huge Potion and a Huge Tonic!

data.value: Death Bringer

data.value: You found a Huge Potion!

data.name: ZA624
data.value: You found a Huge Tonic!

data.name: ZA625
data.value: Is that Blood Metal Ore!? I haven't seen crafting material of this caliber in ages. I can build you a magnificent weapon and armor set if you so desire.

data.name: ZA626
data.value: I call it!

data.name: ZA627
data.value: Right. Well I guess the new weapon and armor goes to the thief.

data.name: ZA628
data.value: Will has recieved the Death Bringer scythe and Blood Leather armor!

data.name: ZA629
data.value: This stuff better work or you'll be hearing from me. Uh, I mean, thanks....

data.name: ZA630
data.value: Sorry. I'm not very good with manners. I'm working on it.

data.name: ZA631
data.value: Ah, I see you found some Starfire Ore. That is a very rare ore with mysteriously magical properties.

data.name: ZA632
data.value: I could craft a very special weapon and armor set designed to enhance magical abilities if you would like.

data.name: ZA633
data.value: See if you can find me some more rare ores to work with. I truely enjoy the challenge of working with new materials.

data.name: ZA634
data.value: I hope the gifts I've made for you will help you to defeat Mal'ticar. The fate of our world rests on your shoulders now.

data.name: ZA635
data.value: Yes, please!

data.name: ZA636
data.value: I've been getting a little tired of my old gear anyway...

data.name: ZA637
data.value: Cara has recieved Sorceress' Robes and Book of Myths!

data.name: ZA638
data.value: I'm particularly proud of my work this time.

data.name: ZA639
data.value: You have bits of Starfire Ore crafted to your armor and the pendant in your book to amplify your magical skills.

data.name: ZA640
data.value: I can't thank you enough Zella. I promise to make good use of what you've given me.

data.name: ZA641
data.value: Nathan! You did it!

data.name: ZA642
data.value: Where did he go? What happend!?

data.name: ZA643
data.value: It's over. Mal'ticar is gone.

data.name: ZA644
data.value: What do we do now?

data.name: ZA645
data.value: My people need me. I made a promise to live for this kingdom and I plan to uphold it.

data.name: ZA646
data.value: That sounds like a good plan to me. I'll help.

data.name: ZA647
data.value: I guess you can count me in too. You'll need all the help you can get.

data.name: ZA648
data.value: You still have something of a monster infestation after all.

data.name: ZA649
data.value: Our job is far from over. Thank you for helping. My parents would be proud.

data.name: ZA650
data.value: The cursed Knight stabs it's target with it's empowered spear.

data.value: Nemesis Cannon

data.value: Drains the energy from the soul, replenishing the life of the caster and steals their strength and stamina.

data.name: ZA658
data.value: Boggimus has gained the powers of Chepetawa, Great Monsoon will damage and curse all targets.

data.name: ZA661

data.name: ZA662

data.name: ZA663
data.value: Miasma

data.name: ZA664
data.value: A noxious gas emission that damages the enemy. This may leave the targets blinded and weakened.

data.name: ZA665
data.value: Ah, it's you. I bet you're wondering why I'm here. While you were out, we were invaded and now we're all dead!

data.name: ZA666
data.value: Just kidding! Endor came to me with a new business venture.

data.name: ZA667
data.value: He thought creating this astral projection of myself could double my profit, but I tend to get little business out here for some reason.

data.name: ZA668
data.value: Let me heal those wounds for you sir.

data.name: ZA669
data.value: Nathan, Cara, and Will went on to rid Agora of the evil that still remained. Those years were long and grueling, but the bond they formed was stronger for it. Through their efforts and the help of the survivors, they were able to rebuild the kingdom to be even grander than it was before. Nathan took his place on the throne where he worked tirelessly to solve the problems of his people and his subjects loved him all the more for it.

data.name: ZA670
data.value: Cara spent much of the early years healing the wounded and teaching others how to heal as well. Word quickly spread and Cara eventually became a symbol of love and devotion to the people of Agora. Word around the castle is that Nathan and Cara have been seen taking strolls around the garden as of late. News of their union is expected in the near future.

data.name: ZA671
data.value: The lack of control Will felt everyday due to his blindness instantly disappeared when he was defending himself in combat. Will's desire to feel in control led him to train others how to be skilled fighters like himself....by fighting them of course. Will eventually learned to treat others with a little more kindness and respect, even if it was just a ploy to steal their things later.

data.name: ZA672
data.value: The three heroes remain vigilant against the return of Mal'ticar for who could know what plots are forming in the shadows.

data.name: ZA673
data.value: Thank you for playing Lacuna Reaver

data.name: ZA674
data.value: A memorial was held in Will's honor soon after his death. Nathan and Cara told stories of their travels and how Will selflessly risked his life in service of their cause. Over the years, tales of Will turned to legend and songs were written in his memory. A statue of Will stands in the courtyard of Verithus Castle so all who visit may remember his sacrifice.

data.name: ZA675
data.value: The two heroes remain vigilant against the return of Mal'ticar for who could know what plots are forming in the shadows.

data.name: ZA676
data.value: Nathan and Cara went on to rid Agora of the evil that still remained. Those years were long and grueling, but the bond they formed was stronger for it. Through their efforts and the help of the survivors, they were able to rebuild the kingdom to be even grander than it was before. Nathan took his place on the throne where he worked tirelessly to solve the problems of his people and his subjects loved him all the more for it.

data.name: ZA677
data.value: I have heard of a rare plant that has unknown magical properties. If I could find it Endor would sure be impressed with me.

data.name: ZA678
data.value: It can't be! You actually found the Mysteria Plant. Endor will be so proud of me!

data.name: ZA679
data.value: Please take this as a token of my appreciation.

data.name: ZA680
data.value: You have received brand new snow boots!

data.name: ZA681
data.value: I still cant believe you found it. Thanks again.

data.name: ZA682
data.value: Snow Boots

data.name: ZA683
data.value: They have never been worn.

data.name: ZA684
data.value: Compass

data.name: ZA685
data.value: It appears to be broken.

data.name: ZA686
data.value: My feet are killing me! If only I could afford new boots.

data.name: ZA687
data.value: Wow! these are really nice snow boots!

data.name: ZA688
data.value: I don't have any money but please take this instead.

data.name: ZA689
data.value: You have received a compass.

data.name: ZA690
data.value: My feet feel so much better now.

data.name: ZA691
data.value: Eye of Shambala

data.name: ZA692
data.value: Your maps now reveal the locations of all items, chests, and people.

data.name: ZA693
data.value: Oh no! This is not good, this is not good.

data.name: ZA694
data.value: Where is it? I am always losing things.

data.name: ZA695
data.value: A compass! Just what I need. I can find anything with this.

data.name: ZA696
data.value: Please take this useless thing. It has been giving me nothing but trouble. I don't even know why the Queen gave it to me.

data.name: ZA697
data.value: You have received the Eye of Shambala!

data.name: ZA698
data.value: With this compass I can find anything.

data.name: ZA699
data.value: Oh no! Where did it go?

data.name: ZA700
data.value: Sound FX, Audio Recording & Mixing

data.name: ZA701
data.value: Cara's Plain Book has been upgraded to a Fantasy Book!

data.name: ZA702
data.value: Forbidden Cavern

data.name: ZA703
data.value: Map of Forbidden Cavern. Must be in Forbidden Cavern to view the map. (Press "M" on map to view)

data.name: ZA704
data.value: Thanks for the help! All of us here seem to be glitched, must be a bug in the game. Can you please fix the rest of us?

data.name: ZA705
data.value: Ah, Nathan. We knew you'd be the one to save us. It was logically impossible for anybody else to find us.

data.name: ZA706
data.value: The world you live in, was created by all of us.

data.name: ZA707
data.value: I know it's a lot to take in, you may talk to us if you have any questions or if you're in need of therapy.

data.name: ZA708
data.value: Kyle: Hey there! A lot of the people you talk to were made by me and my brother next to me. I also balanced the combat, Wow!

data.name: ZA709
data.value: Glen: I was in charge of making the story, along with the help of Kyle and Ryan! Kyle and I worked together on setting up npc's.

data.name: ZA710
data.value: Ryan: I was the art director! A lot of the combat characters and people were made by me!

data.name: ZA711
data.value: Gerren: I managed everybody to make sure everything was complete on time. I also helped with art and quests!

data.name: ZA712
data.value: David: I was the advisor of everybody! I also made sure everything was optimized with some help from the rest of us!

data.name: ZA713
data.value: Michael: I made all of the music and some sound effects!

data.name: ZA714
data.value: Matt: I set the ground work of your fighting system! I also created the AI for the creatures that are always trying to kill you!

data.name: ZA715
data.value: Jonathan: I made the art for the maps and designed them myself!

data.name: ZA716
data.value: James: I made the creation of all of this possible!

data.name: ZA717
data.value: Malticar slams the ground dealing great damage to a single target. May rejuvinate stamina.

data.name: ZA718
data.value: Arlan didn't survive the night. Though his phisical wounds were great, Cara believes his mental wounds were greater. The realization of what he had done was too much to live with. In the end he truely did regret his actions.

data.name: ZA719
data.value: Arlan seems to be alive...barely.

data.name: ZA720
data.value: Training Sword

data.name: ZA721
data.value: Not the sharpest blade in the chest, but it will due.

data.name: ZA722
data.value: I finaly got it! A cure for the swamp villagers.

data.name: ZA723
data.value: Whats that you say? You already cured them.

data.name: ZA724
data.value: Well thats great news. But what am I going to do with this now?
